message.name: DEFERRED_PROCESS_INFO_MESSAGE
message.locale: The selected tasks are currently being forwarded and a notification will be sent to your Inbox once this completes.

message.name: DEFERRED_PROCESS_SUCCESS_MESSAGE
message.locale: Forwarding of tasks from %1s to %2s completed successfully.

message.name: DEFERRED_PROCESS_FAILURE_MESSAGE_SUBJECT
message.locale: Forwarding of tasks from %1s to %2s was unsuccessful.

message.name: DEFERRED_PROCESS_FAILURE_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION_1
message.locale: The following caused the forward to fail:

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_INFO_MESSAGE
message.locale: There are too many tasks selected to forward now. This forward will need to be performed in batch mode, please schedule with your administrator.

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_INDIVIDUAL_FAILURE_MESSAGE_SUBJECT
message.locale: Task %1s was not forwarded from %2s to %3s

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_INDIVIDUAL_FAILURE_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION_1
message.locale: The following caused the forward to fail:

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_SUMMARY_SUBJECT
message.locale: Report from 'Bulk Task Forward' batch job run on %1s at %2s.

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_SUMMARY_LINE_1
message.locale: Number of tasks specified for forward: %1s

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_SUMMARY_LINE_2
message.locale: Number of tasks successfully forwarded: %1s

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_SUMMARY_LINE_3
message.locale: Number of tasks failed forward: %1s

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_SUMMARY_LINE_4
message.locale: Note: Notifications were sent to owners informing them of the failed forwards.

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_SUMMARY_LINE_5
message.locale: Number of invalid task forwards: %1s

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_SUMMARY_LINE_6
message.locale: Invalid task forward means attempting to forward the task that has been already forwarded to the same user and not reserved by user. This applies to the following tasks: %1s.\nNote notifications were not sent to owners for these invalid forwards.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASK_QUEUED_FOR_LATER_REASSIGNMENT
message.locale: %1n Tasks have been successfully queued for later reassignment.

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_TASK_REASSIGNMENT
message.locale: If more than %1n task are selected, reassignment will happen offline (e.g. in deferred or batch process).

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_FORWARD_TASK_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT
message.locale: Task Forward Notification

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_TASK_REASSIGNMENT_NOTIFICATION
message.locale: %1n task(s) were forwarded to you from %2s by %3s

message.name: INF_TASK_FORWARD_BATCH_OUTPUTFILEID
message.locale: TaskForwardBatch

message.name: INF_ASSIGNED_TASK_FORWARD_BATCH_OUTPUTFILEID
message.locale: AssignedTaskForwardBatch
